item.title: Call for abstracts is open now
item.description: We invite you to submit your original contributions in the field of MR simulation and MR-guided radiotherapy to the 11th MR in RT symposium, which will take place on April 14-16th, 2025 at NYU Langone Health campus in New York. Abstract Submission Submit your abstract here: https://app.oxfordabstracts.com/stages/75947/submitter Abstract Format The abstract is limited to 500 words and may include one table and up to two figures. It should be structured into the following sections: Purpose, Methods, Materials, Results and Conclusions.

item.title: Privacy Policy
